動物用藥品名稱: 貝歐克雞新城病、產卵下降症、傳染性支氣管炎不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S.S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
效能(適應症): 預防肉種雞及蛋雞感染新城病、產卵下降症、傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS, INACTIVATED, AT LEAST 10^9EID50;EDS`76 VIRUS, INACTIVATED, AT LEAST 1000HA UNIT;INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS, INACTIVATED, AT LEAST 10^6.7EID50;SALINE SOLUTION 0.035ML; MINERAL OIL (LIQUID PARAFFIN - MARCOL 52)0.34ML; SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 0.05ML;THIOMERSAL (SODIUM ETHYLMERCURITHIOSALICILATE) 50MCG.
